narrative.narrative: T'way Airlines is a South Korean low cost airline based at Incheon Airport and has a base at Gimpo Airport also. It was founded in 2010 and commenced operation just a month later after it's founding in September 2010. It achieved a profit in 2013 at just three years into it's life. They serve 9 regular destinations, international destinations include Bangkok,Fukuoka,Saga,Sapporo,and Taipei. It also offers 9 charters destinations to Chinese cities. They have 7 737-800's 5 of which are leased as of May 2014.
